lead_paragraph: HOLECHEK--James A.,86, Baltimore artist, writer, teacher and public relations executive, died July 20 at his home. Served in the Army, 11th Airborne Division, 1953. An avid yachtsman. Wrote feature stories and boating column for the Baltimore Sun. Created the Maryland Memorial Monument at Gettysburg, 1994. Survived by his wife, Patricia (Phillips), daughter JoAnn Etter, son Mark and their loving families. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HOLECHEK, JAMES A.
